title: From RNN to Transformers
abstract: How to make machines understand natural language? Take this Journey - Building a Knowledge Hierachy for Large Language Models from the Scratch!

title: Accelerated Fine-tuning Research
abstract: Recently, I have been contributing to ServerlessLLM, a rising star product in the field of machine learning systems. My contribution is mainly about fine-tuning on pre-trained models. How to speed up the fine-tuning process? How to deploy multiple fine-tuned versions at scale? This is an interesting question.

title: 饮茶笔记
abstract: A story about a Pu'er Tea beginner player
